results.content:
Well thought our course and to the point. Syed is a great Instructor and teaches at a steady pace - very easy to understand and explains core and difficult concepts in layman terms.

Great work Syed - Thanks.
results.content_html:

results.content:
Excellent course so far. The second half of the course is excellent as it dives into Facebook development with PHP coding. I have learned valuable skills and the instructor is very knowledgeable and presents the course in a very good manner and easy to understand.
You need to have some background knowledge of html css and php, though.
I enjoyed this course! Thank you Syed for putting up yet another great course.

results.content:
This course is awesome! Finally, something I have been searching for. As an experienced developer, I went directly to the second half of the course!
I must say the instructor is very easy to follow and understand. Practice tasks assigned are great, but could be more.
Overall, extremely satisfied with this course - It is worth the investment. Thanks.

results.content: Wow! Clear and concise step by step easy to follow. Thank you for putting up this course. Great course with knowledgeable instructor.

response.content: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and support! I appreciate it.
